description: Hey, my Name is Ahmet Kilic! I am a full stack software developer studying Business Informatics! I am interested in Cloud Computing and similar topics. Welcome to my personal portfolio page. Scroll down to see some of my past projects.
imageALT: This is a Picture of Ahmet Kilic

title: Blockcerts extension:
description: I had the chance to work on a PoC extension for an opensource educational credentialing platform which is called Blockcerts. Learned a lot about Blockchain Engineering.
usedTech: Web3, Python, OpenBadges v2, Soliditiy, Ethereum Blockchain, IPFS
imageALT: This is a screenshot of the website blockcerts.org

title: Opensense.network Serverless Migration:
description: In this project I had the opportunity to migrate a Data Importer for opensense.network into a Serverless solution. Learned a lot about Serverless infrastructure and Serverless principles.
usedTech: IBM Cloud Functions, Apache OpenWhisk, Python, Flask, MongoDB, Serverless framework, Docker
imageALT: This is a screenshot of the website opensense.network

title: Full-Stack Slack Clone:
description: Here I developed a simple Slack clone including Front-End and Back-End. Learned a lot about Rest and MicroServices.
usedTech: Docker, SQL, Java, Spring, Spring Boot, JavaScript, JQuerry, CSS, HTML
imageALT: This is a screenshot of the Full-Stack Slack Clone

title: Portfolio Page:
description: This project is basically what you see on this page. It is an overview of some of my projects and relevant links. Learned a lot about React and Responsive Design.
imageALT: This is a screenshot of this portfolio website from Ahmet Kilic

title: Agile is the New Orange:
description: This application allows users to create task boards containing lanes and tasks. Therefore, it is a basic scrum board web application that can be hosted locally.
imageALT: This is a screenshot of the agile is the new Orange application from Ahmet Kilic
